attributes.action: Allow all ex army Ghurkhas to have right of residence in the united kingdom and / or acess to NHS treatment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As in the example of Gyanendra Rai, severely wounded in the service of this country during the Falklands conflict being refused leave to enter this country for treatment of those wounds and their after effects. To limit this right to residence to those who retired before 1997 is shaming and unreasonable, and does not reflect well on this country.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petiton at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Gurkha-soldiers/
